title: 12/04/20 HOUR 2- Scott Hanson
itunes:title: 12/04/20 HOUR 2- Scott Hanson
description:
Scott Hanson tells Dan that when he is on Red Zone; he takes no restroom break for 8 hours. Scott says he has named his Fantasy Football Team Iron Bladder.
